department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: Man's coat, heavy wine-colored ribbed silk; geometric patterns top and bottom woven in silver braid, ornamented with designs in cerise and green, is woven down either side of the front. Edges of sleeves and all seams are outlined with narrow silver braid. The section covering ther shoulders at the back is woven entirely of silver threads.
title: Man's Coat
